meanings.definition: To remove toxic substances from the body.
meanings.sent1: She is detoxifying her body by drinking lots of water.
meanings.sent2: After a weekend of unhealthy eating, she decided to start detoxifying her system.
meanings.sent3: The detoxifying smoothie tasted surprisingly good.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude is detoxifying the negative energy around him.
meanings.sent5: The process of detoxifying can make you feel refreshed and energized.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to cleanse or purify the body.
meanings.sent1: The detoxifying tea helped her feel healthier.
meanings.sent2: She bought detoxifying skincare products to improve her complexion.
meanings.sent3: The detoxifying spa treatment left her feeling rejuvenated.
meanings.sent4: The detoxifying effects of yoga practice were evident in her flexibility.
meanings.sent5: The detoxifying properties of the herbal supplement were well-known in the community.

meanings.definition: The process of eliminating harmful toxins from the body.
meanings.sent1: She underwent a detoxifying program to improve her health.
meanings.sent2: The detoxifying of the body can lead to increased energy levels.
meanings.sent3: The detoxifying of the river was a major environmental project.
meanings.sent4: The detoxifying of her diet resulted in clearer skin.
meanings.sent5: The detoxifying process can help the body function more efficiently.
